description_html: The Cube Collection offers beautiful and functional bath furniture with exquisitely simple styling. Designed with Italian-style integrated continuous handles, a larger than average 28" height for extra storage space, deep drawers with full 18”-extension Grasshopper® soft-closing glides and concealed interior drawers, the Cube Collection is unmatched in functionality. The design features a rich Walnut or Ash Grey woodgrain or a Glossy White polyurethane-protected finish. Choice of basins and countertops include a pristine glass top with ceramic bowls in White or Biscuit, X-Stone™ and Quartzstone™. The Cube’s sleek, modern lines coupled with its unprecedented storage space are the fullest embodiment of Madeli’s Functional Elegance motto.
